オプション1: Star Man stood in front of Trapezoid Man's room.
"Hello. How are you holding up?"
"No good... The fever, the pain... I can't do anything..."
Seeing Trapezoid Man's pained expression, Star Man frowned.
"I have a bit more to discuss. I'll go get the kids, so please wait."
"Yeah, got it."

"Today I met a living islander.
And it seems if I leave this island within a year,
I'll be saved."
"Huh? Huh? Ah—well, that's great!"
"Thanks. I want to work harder than ever to escape within a year."
Trapezoid Man and the others nodded.

"The islander I met today was an old woman...
She said the people who lived here all made contracts with the demon
and were wiped out."

"Also, the monsters on this island are biological weapons.
They inherit plant traits and can live without eating or drinking."
"Ahh, so that's how it is."

"Also, while I was searching for islands along the coast today,
I realized something."

"Since Poweregg Planet is round, from the mountaintop
we might find farther islands. Tomorrow I plan to head for the summit."
"Makes sense. I didn't realize until you said it."
"What did she say about that strange white person?"
asked Square Man.
"Ah—sorry. I didn't ask that."
"If I meet her again, I'll ask."
Star Man decided to head to the shrine again tomorrow.
